text: The Albert-Eden-Roskill Ward is an Auckland Council ward which elects two councillors and covers the Albert-Eden and Puketāpapa Local Boards. Currently the councillors are Christine Fletcher and Cathy Casey. ==Councillors == {| class="wikitable sortable" !Election ! !Councillors elected !Affiliation !Votes !Notes |- |rowspan=2| 2010 |1 |Christine Fletcher | bgcolor="lightblue" |Citizens & Ratepayers |20,777 | |- |2 |Cathy Casey | bgcolor="lightpink" |City Vision |15,087 | |- |rowspan=2| 2013 |1 |Christine Fletcher | bgcolor="lightblue" |Communities and Residents |17,939 | |- |2 |Cathy Casey | bgcolor="lightpink" |City Vision |16,545 | |- |rowspan=2| 2016 |1 |Cathy Casey | bgcolor="lightpink" |City Vision |19,256 | |- |2 |Christine Fletcher | bgcolor="lightblue" |Communities and Residents |16,925 | |- |rowspan=2| 2019 |1 |Christine Fletcher | bgcolor="lightblue" |Communities and Residents |20239 | |- |2 |Cathy Casey | bgcolor="lightpink" |City Vision |19255 | |} ==References== Category:Wards of the Auckland Region
title: Albert-Eden-Roskill Ward
